title: Conditionals Zero: Facts and Truths
objectives: Understand Conditionals Zero at Beginner level
Apply Conditionals Zero in real conversations

vocabulary.example: If it rains, the ground gets wet.
The sun rises in the east.

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Conditionals Zero.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Conditionals Zero at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Conditionals Zero daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct zero conditional sentence:
options: If you heat water, it boils.
If you will heat water, it boils.
If you heat water, it will boil.

exercises.question: Describe a fact or routine you follow every day.

culturalNote: Zero Conditional is frequently used in American education and safety instructions to state facts and rules clearly.
